answers.answer: I'm in Brisbane. My friends have been able to ask to be induced and their drs have done it 10days past due date. With my first my dr was going to induce me at 38wks due to preeclamplsia but I ended up having a csection at 35wks.
I have diabetes and I'm taking insulin.. My sugar levels are pretty high and they keep increasing the dose everytime I go. I really want to have him early :(
My friend was in the same position and induced at 38wks. I hope things get better for you!

question: is anyone from Sydney that is expecting or already has a child? Just curious to know was it up to you whether to get induced or not?
title: Any Sydney mum's??
